characters: Driver of a white sedan, driver of a white truck
summary: In this segment, the vehicle is driving on a multi-lane road with moderate traffic. The white sedan ahead maintains a consistent speed, while a white truck on the right side gradually moves forward and overtakes the self-driving vehicle.
actions: The self-driving vehicle maintains a steady speed and lane position, keeping a safe distance from the vehicles ahead. The vehicle does not change lanes or speed significantly, indicating a routine driving scenario.
key_objects: 1) Front: A white sedan, approximately 30 meters away, maintaining a consistent speed. 2) Right: A white truck, approximately 5 meters away, gradually overtaking the self-driving vehicle.
